name: Talking kiki the chihuahua puppy: Your cutie best virtual pet everytime you care :3
name_original: Talking kiki the chihuahua puppy: Your cutie best virtual pet everytime you care :3
description: Viki the puppy is when you take care of your best chihuahua dog game - this you will take care of viki, Viki want's to adopt with you! Cute food will increase your fullness by 30%. Water blue bowl will make your Water to 30% increases unleash fullness and water, Click the play so move the mouse so viki won't catch it as long as you can. 2gether with you! She is dirty, click the soap button or c to wash her off, 2gether forever! click the shower button or v to wash soap durts, 2gether and fever! click the brush button or b to brush the fur, best friends. You need any help just click the green flag
